about_the_game:
Fill Up Your Pot and Make it Back. Safely


Watermaids are all about heading out and bringing back fresh water for the villagers. Navigate treacherous terrain and evade enemies to find a springwater well.



Fill up your trusty pot and return to the village before the sun sets. Be careful though, you're not as agile as you were before filling up.

Take Down Vicious Beasts and Explore the Island




Escape, Escort, and Strike Back. Outmaneuver cunning enemies and uncover the secrets of Nada Village Island. Investigate the disappearance of your predecessor and keep the villagers safe from the calamity that is to befall the island.

Features


  • Fluid parkour-like moves for wall jumping, dashing, sliding, and climbing
  • A narrative-driven linear adventure inspired by Sri Lankan culture and folklore
  • Chase sequences, boss battles, and time trials with a steady difficulty curve
  • Death-stranding inspired hauling mechanics that impact player movement

short_description: Water Maid is all about fetching water. Run, jump and dash to avoid enemies and find the elusive fresh water springs scattered around the island. Fill up your pot and make it back to the village, safe and sound.
